deliver incredible immersive incabin audio experiences the work centers around delivering new features developed within our research teams to our tuning engineers for automotive productionltbrgtltbrgtthis software engineer will develop and support a suite of tools responsible for aspects of audio processing rendering and deployment think of it like our own daw and plugin set they will be responsible for the entire development process requirements gathering development testing and providing tool training and documentationltbrgtltbrgtltstronggtltugtrequired
